name: Super Mario Bros 5
description:
Super Mario Bros 5 Is a fan game by no way affiliated with Nintendo The Game is inspired by the old Classic Mario Games (SMB3 and SMBW mainly). The Only reason why it's not called SMB4 because

1. Super Mario Bros 4 Is Super Mario World (In Japan)

2. There are Fan games called Super Mario Bros 4

Super Mario Bros 5 Includes:

All New 2D Levels

A Remixed Soundtrack

A Original story

8 Main Worlds Plus 2 Extra Worlds

Returning Bosses

Hidden secrets and exits.

World Maps to explore

And Much More!

Story: After Mario took a grand odyssey around the world. Peach invites Mario and Luigi to a party, Unfortunately, Bowser returns with his Krazy Koopa gang (Koopalings and Boom Boom) And now, Bowser Vows to marry Princess peach once again, and this time Bowser is after the Orbs of Power which grants the user Powers that can destroy universes.

Can Mario Stop Bowser once again?

Engine: Mario Builder

Engine Created By Ting_thing
